bill.title: Wages; Payment of Compensation
bill.description: Requires employers to provide employees with specific wage and employer information in employees' pay records; requires employers to maintain accurate and timely wage recordkeeping. Effective January 1, 2014. (SB332 HD2)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDL, WAM.
The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-01-13 10:30AM in conference room 016.
The committee(s) on JDL deferred the measure until 02-08-13 9:30AM in conference room 016.
The committee on JDL has deleted the measure from decision making scheduled on 02-08-13 9:30AM in conference room 016.
The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-11-13 10:00AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 280) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-26-13 10:05AM in conference room 211.
The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 02-27-13 9:15AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 10 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, Espero, Kahele, Kouchi, Ruderman, L. Thielen, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) English, Keith-Agaran.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 747) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 03-05-13.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Galuteria). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 112) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to EDB/LAB, FIN, referral sheet 30
Re-referred to LAB, FIN, referral sheet 34
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Friday, 03-15-13 9:10AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Hashem, Aquino, Ichiyama, Ing, Takumi, Yamane, Yamashita, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1134) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and McKelvey, Takumi, Woodson excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 03-27-13 4:00PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Johanson, Hashem, Ing, Jordan, Kobayashi, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Takayama, Tokioka, Woodson, Yamashita, Fukumoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cullen.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1492) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-09-13.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 516).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 607).
Reconsideration of action taken on 04-11-13 in disagreeing to the House amendments.
Senate agrees with House amendments. Placed on the calendar for Final Reading on 04-16-13.
One Day Notice 04-16-13.
House conferees appointed: Nakashima, Hashem Co-Chairs; Ichiyama, Johanson.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 699).
Passed Final Reading. 24 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom. 0 Excused: none.
Received notice of reconsideration, Senate agreement, and Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 696).
Enrolled to Governor.
